trans-unit.source: Prevents the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) from disassembling an assembly.
trans-unit.target: Impede que o [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) desmonte um assembly.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Apply the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute> attribute to an assembly or module to prevent the assembly or module from being disassembled using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md).
trans-unit.target: Aplicar o <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute> de atributo para um assembly ou módulo para impedir que o assembly ou módulo que está sendo desmontado usando o [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md).

trans-unit.source: This attribute does not prevent an assembly from being viewed using reflection.
trans-unit.target: Esse atributo não impede que um assembly de ser visualizado usando reflexão.

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute> attribute does not block the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) from viewing header information and meta-information.
trans-unit.target: Observe que <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute> atributo não bloqueia o [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) exibam informações de cabeçalho e informações de meta.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to apply the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute> attribute to an assembly.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como aplicar o <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute> de atributo a um assembly.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: Apply the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute> attribute to an assembly or module to prevent the assembly or module from being disassembled using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md).
trans-unit.target: Aplicar o <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute> de atributo para um assembly ou módulo para impedir que o assembly ou módulo que está sendo desmontado usando o [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to apply the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute> attribute to an assembly.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como aplicar o <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute> de atributo a um assembly.
